alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Calloway; Christian; Hopkins; Lyon; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 3:10PM EST by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Calloway, Muhlenberg, Christian, southeastern Caldwell, Trigg, southeastern Hopkins, Todd and southeastern Lyon Counties through 300 PM CST... At 208 PM CST, automated weather stations reported strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Princeton to 7 miles south of Murray. Wind speeds from 40 to 50 mph have been measured along this line. Movement of the storms was east at 65 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Dawson Springs around 215 PM CST. Nortonville and Mortons Gap around 225 PM CST. Other locations in the path of these storms include Graham, Powderly, Greenville, Central City, Fort Campbell, Hopkinsville and Pembroke. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 53 and 88. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 97 and 109. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Caldwell; Calloway; Christian; Hopkins; Lyon; Muhlenberg; Todd; Trigg
